quizSynopsis: How much do you know about homeownership? How do you increase your credit scores? Find out more by checking the FAQ and keep up with articles. Come back here afterward to answer questions to test your knowledge and earn sweet prizes!

questions.question: When financing your home with a lender, the lender wants to make sure that:
answers: The mortgage amount is up to approximately three times your annual gross income
A monthly mortgage payment does not exceed approximately 28% of your gross monthly income
Total gap payments does not exceed 10% of gross income
A monthly mortgage payment does not exceed approximately 40% of your gross monthly income
